search.query: | savedsearch Illumio_PortScan pce_fqdn=$pce_fqdn$ org_id=$org_id$ ```Convert timestamp here because _time gets lost in the mvcombine call later``` | eval pce_fqdn = $pce_fqdn$, org_id = $org_id$, Timestamp = strftime(_time, "%Y-%m-%d %H:%M:%S %Z") ```Look up labels and map them to key:value pairs using illumio_labels_lookup``` | foreach *_href [lookup illumio_workloads_lookup href AS <<FIELD>> OUTPUTNEW labels AS <<MATCHSTR>>_labels | lookup illumio_labels_lookup href AS <<MATCHSTR>>_labels, pce_fqdn, org_id OUTPUT key AS label_key, value AS label_value | eval <<MATCHSTR>>_labels = mvzip(label_key, label_value, ":") | fields - label_key label_value] | fillnull value="-" src_labels dest_labels ```Check that the user has the illumio_quarantine_workload role``` | appendcols [| rest splunk_server=local /services/authentication/current-context | eval show_quarantine=if(roles="illumio_quarantine_workload", 1, 0) | table show_quarantine] | filldown show_quarantine ```For quarantine, we only care about internal workloads performing scanning``` | eval show_quarantine = if(show_quarantine=1 AND src_href!="-", 1, 0) | eval workload_href = if(src_href="-", dest_href, src_href) | eval Quarantine = workload_href . "," . pce_fqdn . "," . org_id . "," . show_quarantine, Investigate=if(src_host="-", dest_host, src_host) . "," . pce_fqdn . "," . org_id | table Timestamp, src_ip, src_host, src_labels, dest_ip, dest_host, dest_labels, Quarantine, Investigate | rename src_host as Source, src_ip as "Source IP", src_labels AS "Source Labels", dest_host as Destination, dest_ip as "Destination IP", dest_labels AS "Destination Labels"
